alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 08 at 2:06AM MST until December 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Harding County, Northern Perkins County, Butte County, the Northern Meade County Plains and Southern Perkins County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Combined with the strong winds, light snow and blowing snow will reduce visibilities and cause hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins
